 2013-06082013-05-30,  ,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations(1688 — Arsenic Trioxide)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1688 — ARSENIC TRIOXIDE) in order to exempt the sale of a drug that contains ARSENIC TRIOXIDE as a medicinal ingredient from the prohibition contained in subsection C.01.040 (b) of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0113 Publication Date: 2013-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
